name: Flipnote Studio 3D
description:
Flipnote Studio 3D is a casual game. It was originally released in 2016. Nintendo published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Flipnote Studio 3D on Nintendo 3DS.
Yoshiaki Koizumi produced the game. It was directed by Hideaki Shimizu and Yasuhiko Matsuzaki.
